overview_of_class: This course introduces first year Ph.D. students to research in Media Technology, and Society (MTS) and Technology and Social Behavior (TSB) and gives guidance on how to be a productive and responsible scholar.
name: Introduction  to Grad Research in MTS
title: SoC MTS 501-0-20 Introduction  to Grad Research in MTS

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course introduces first year Ph.D. students to research in Media Technology, and Society (MTS) and Technology and Social Behavior (TSB) and gives guidance on how to be a productive and responsible scholar.

subject: MTS
